channel.title: 5v source off Axoloti for Reference or More?
channel.description: I wired up 5v power from the Axoloti to a midi splitter board from Meeblip. Now I am too chicken to power it up. Is the 5v there for reference only or can it supply enough mA to the midi splitter?

item.title: 5v source off Axoloti for Reference or More?
item.dc:creator: @hitachii Hitachii
item.description:
@hitachii wrote:

If you're using the 5v pins in the back, the splitter runs on 5v, and the polarity isn't reversed, it should be fine. I'm using the pins to power a Teensy and have left it on for hours at a time.

Read full topic
item.source: 5v source off Axoloti for Reference or More?
